sentences.en: A star does not shine because some occult force has caused it to do so.
sentences.cn: 一颗恒星不发光是因为某些未知的力所致.

sentences.en: Astrology and alchemy are occult sciences.
sentences.cn: 占星学和炼丹术为神秘之学.

sentences.en: Conclusion: Multiple viral variants accumulate in the lier of occult HB - infected patients.
sentences.cn: 结论: 隐性HB感染病人肝内有复杂的病毒变异型蓄积.

sentences.en: He and the black - leather fellow looked very occult.
sentences.cn: 他和那个象黑皮革似的家伙显得很神秘.

sentences.en: He was a student of the occult.
He's interested in witchcraft and the occult.
sentences.cn: 他对巫术魔法情有独钟。

sentences.en: Methods: Urine liquidanalyzer inspection and only clone antibody occult blood test.
sentences.cn: 方法: 尿液分析仪检查和单克隆抗体隐血试验.

sentences.en: Objective : To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of occult thyroid carcinoma ( OCT ).
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨甲状腺隐匿性癌的诊断与治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and operation methods of occult scleral rupture.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨隐匿巩膜破裂伤的诊断要点及手术方式.

sentences.en: The occult rites of the organization were revealed only to its members.
sentences.cn: 这个组织的秘密礼仪只有其成员可以知道.

sentences.en: Were not all things charged with occult virtues?
sentences.cn: 所有的一切事情,难道不是都有隐藏的品质?

sentences.en: Who is the occult personality, you or someone else?
sentences.cn: 谁是这具有神秘力量的人, 你或者某个人?

sentences.en: With an almost occult carefulness he turned the door handle, and opened the door an inch.
sentences.cn: 他带着一种几乎是超自然的谨慎,旋转门把柄, 随着低微的嘎吱声,门开了一条缝.

sentences.en: You may also bring occult knowledge forward into the light.
sentences.cn: 你可能还会在认知中产生前卫的超自然的理解.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；超自然的；难以理解的

trans.tran_cn: 超自然的，神秘的，隐藏的

trans.tran_en: mysterious practices and powers involving magic and spirits
